settings.title: Settings
settings.securityDescription: Manage your account security and password settings
settings.notificationSettingsDescription: Control how you receive notifications and updates

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive order updates and important information via email
notifications.pushNotificationsDescription: Get instant updates about your orders and account activity

deleteAcc.title: Delete Account
deleteAcc.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone
deleteAcc.description: Once you delete your account, all your data will be permanently removed
deleteAcc.deleteAccountWarning: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including order history, saved preferences, and personal information. This action cannot be undone.
